snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo of New York will work with the Brady Campaign to Prevent Gun Violence on a yet-to-be announced effort pressing the Justice Department to scrutinize “bad apple” gun merchants.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo says he will support gun-control group Brady Campaign to Prevent Gun Violence in to-be-announced effort pressuring Justice Dept to crack down on unauthorized firearms dealings; has indicated he will continue pursuing issue of gun violence throughout 2016 election season

keywords.value: Brady Campaign to Prevent Gun Violence
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo of New York will work with the Brady Campaign to Prevent Gun Violence on a yet-to-be announced effort pressing the Justice Department to scrutinize “bad apple” gun merchants.

headline.print_headline: Wading Into U.S. Politics, Cuomo Plans Big Role in Push Against Gun Violence
headline.main: Cuomo Planning Role in National Gun Control Campaign
